thread.title: BRIEF-BB&T Reports Record Quarterly Earnings Of $0.94 Per Diluted Share Up $0.17, Or 22%

title: BRIEF-BB&T Reports Record Quarterly Earnings Of $0.94 Per Diluted Share Up $0.17, Or 22%
text:
April 19, 2018 / 9:51 AM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-BB&T Reports Record Quarterly Earnings Of $0.94 Per Diluted Share Up $0.17, Or 22% Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 19 (Reuters) - BB&T Corp: 
* BB&T REPORTS RECORD QUARTERLY EARNINGS OF $0.94 PER DILUTED SHARE; UP $0.17, OR 22%, COMPARED TO FOURTH QUARTER 2017 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.94 
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.92 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* Q1 REVENUE $2.84 BILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $2.83 BILLION 
* QTRLY AVERAGE LOANS AND LEASES HELD FOR INVESTMENT WERE $142.9 BILLION, UP $194 MILLION 
* QTRLY AVERAGE DEPOSITS WERE $157.1 BILLION COMPARED TO $158.0 BILLION FOR Q4 OF 2017 
* QUARTER-END RISK BASED COMMON EQUITY TIER 1 RATIO 10.2 PERCENT VERSUS 10.3 PERCENT REPORTED LAST YEAR 
* QTRLY TAXABLE EQUIVALENT NET INTEREST INCOME $1,656 MILLION VERSUS $1,649 MILLION REPORTED LAST YEAR Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
